snippet: Susanne Craig on the reaction inside Goldman Sachs to a public rebuke; why marriage is for rich people; and Evelyn M. Rusli discusses why brokers who trade private shares have run afoul of regulators.
abstract: Susanne Craig on the reaction inside Goldman Sachs to a public rebuke; why marriage is for rich people; and Evelyn M. Rusli discusses why brokers who trade private shares have run afoul of regulators.

headline.main: Business Day Live: Reaction Inside Goldman
